TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ProgressBarRenderer extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于以视觉样式呈现进度栏控件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods used to render a progress bar control with visual styles.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了一套`static`可用于呈现具有的操作系统当前视觉样式的进度栏控件的方法。The class provides a set of `static` methods that can be used to render a progress bar control with the current visual style of the operating system. 呈现控件是指绘制控件的用户界面。Rendering a control refers to drawing the user interface of a control. 这是很有用，如果您正在绘制的自定义控件应具有的当前视觉样式外观。This is useful if you are drawing a custom control that should have the appearance of the current visual style. 若要绘制一个进度栏，请使用或方法来绘制空白的栏，然后使用或方法来绘制填充的栏中的元素。To draw a progress bar, use the or methods to draw the empty bar, and then use the or methods to draw the elements that fill in the bar. 如果视觉样式应用于 windows 的应用程序的工作区在操作系统中启用了可视样式，此类方法将绘制当前视觉样式的进度栏。If visual styles are enabled in the operating system and visual styles are applied to the client area of application windows, the methods of this class will draw the progress bar with the current visual style. 否则的方法和属性的此类将引发。Otherwise, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . 若要确定是否可以使用此类的成员，你可以检查的值属性。To determine whether the members of this class can be used, you can check the value of the property. 此类将包装的功能设置为公开的元素之一， ， ，和类。This class wraps the functionality of a that is set to one of the elements exposed by the , , , and classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[以视觉样式呈现控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用的自定义控件和方法绘制一个垂直进度栏。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom control that uses the and methods to draw a vertical progress bar. 该控件使用重绘每秒的进度栏时添加的代码段。The control uses a to redraw the progress bar with an added piece each second. `SetupProgressBar`方法使用和属性计算绘制每个逐渐变大矩形的高度。The `SetupProgressBar` method uses the and properties to calculate the height of each progressively larger rectangle that is drawn. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#0)]

summary.span: 获取进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: Gets the width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

value.span: 进度栏每个内部格之间的间距的宽度（以像素为单位）。

span.span: The width, in pixels, of the space between each inner piece of the progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值确定的操作系统当前视觉样式。This value is determined by the current visual style of the operating system. 在之前访问此属性，您应验证属性返回`true`。Before accessing this property, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定的每个矩形，表示绘制进度栏的增量大小方法。The following code example uses the property to determine the size of each rectangle that represents an increment of the progress bar drawn by the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/cpp/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ProgressBarRenderer/VB/form1.vb#4)]

exception.span: 操作系统不支持视觉样式。

span.span: The operating system does not support visual styles.
-or-

exception.span: 用户在操作系统中禁用视觉样式。

span.span: Visual styles are disabled by the user in the operating system.
-or-

exception.span: 视觉样式不应用于应用程序窗口的工作区。

span.span: Visual styles are not applied to the client area of application windows.

summary.span: 绘制填充水平进度栏的一组进度栏格。

span.span: Draws a set of progress bar pieces that fill a horizontal progress bar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格跨越的高度`bounds`参数。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the height of the `bounds` parameter. 绘制进度栏格数由宽度`bounds`和返回值和属性。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the width of `bounds` and the values returned by the and properties. 使用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法绘制的每个进度栏格跨越的宽度`bounds`参数。Each progress bar piece drawn by this method spans the width of the `bounds` parameter. 绘制进度栏格数由的高度`bounds`和返回值和。The number of progress bar pieces drawn is determined by the height of `bounds` and the values returned by and . 使用此方法之前，应验证属性返回`true`。Before using this method, you should verify that the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用中的方法事件处理程序以绘制进度栏的每个增量。The following code example uses the method in a event handler to draw each increment of a progress bar. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性为`false`，将引发的方法和属性的此类。If this property is `false`, the methods and properties of this class will throw an . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用属性来确定是否需要调用方法。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to call the method. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
